sentences.en: Although the evidence was circumstantial, the jury reached a guilty verdict.
sentences.pt: Embora a evidência fosse circunstancial, o júri chegou a um veredito de culpado.

sentences.en: He accepted the prestigious role, although with some initial hesitation.
sentences.pt: Ele aceitou o cargo de prestígio, embora com alguma hesitação inicial.

sentences.en: Although technically feasible, the proposed solution is prohibitively expensive.
sentences.pt: Embora tecnicamente viável, a solução proposta é proibitivamente cara.

sentences.en: She managed to smile, although her eyes betrayed her sadness.
sentences.pt: Ela conseguiu sorrir, embora seus olhos traíssem sua tristeza.

sentences.en: Although the economy is recovering, unemployment remains stubbornly high.
sentences.pt: Embora a economia esteja se recuperando, o desemprego permanece persistentemente alto.

sentences.en: He is a brilliant scientist, although somewhat lacking in social skills.
sentences.pt: Ele é um cientista brilhante, embora um tanto carente de habilidades sociais.

sentences.en: Although they are twins, their personalities are diametrically opposed.
sentences.pt: Embora sejam gêmeos, suas personalidades são diametralmente opostas.

sentences.en: We decided to proceed, although the risks were clearly outlined.
sentences.pt: Decidimos prosseguir, embora os riscos estivessem claramente delineados.

sentences.en: Although the book is lengthy, it is a captivating read.
sentences.pt: Embora o livro seja extenso, é uma leitura cativante.

sentences.en: She maintained her composure, although she was furious inside.
sentences.pt: Ela manteve a compostura, muito embora estivesse furiosa por dentro.

sentences.en: Although the sun was shining, the air remained bitterly cold.
sentences.pt: Embora o sol estivesse brilhando, o ar permanecia extremamente frio.

sentences.en: He insisted on driving, although he was clearly exhausted.
sentences.pt: Ele insistiu em dirigir, embora estivesse claramente exausto.

sentences.en: Although we disagreed on tactics, we shared the same goal.
sentences.pt: Embora discordássemos sobre as táticas, compartilhávamos o mesmo objetivo.

sentences.en: The mechanism is effective, although it requires frequent maintenance.
sentences.pt: O mecanismo é eficaz, embora exija manutenção frequente.

sentences.en: Although she is retired, she remains active in her field.
sentences.pt: Embora esteja aposentada, ela permanece ativa em sua área.

sentences.en: The review was generally positive, although it noted some flaws.
sentences.pt: A crítica foi geralmente positiva, embora tenha notado algumas falhas.

sentences.en: Although I understand your perspective, I cannot support your decision.
sentences.pt: Embora eu entenda sua perspectiva, não posso apoiar sua decisão.

sentences.en: They finished the project on time, although over budget.
sentences.pt: Eles terminaram o projeto no prazo, embora acima do orçamento.

sentences.en: Although rarely seen, this species is not considered endangered.
sentences.pt: Embora raramente vista, esta espécie não é considerada ameaçada.

sentences.en: He speaks fluent French, although he has never lived in France.
sentences.pt: Ele fala francês fluente, embora nunca tenha morado na França.

sentences.en: Although the deadline is tight, the team is optimistic.
sentences.pt: Embora o prazo seja apertado, a equipe está otimista.

sentences.en: The legislation passed, although with significant amendments attached.
sentences.pt: A legislação foi aprovada, embora com emendas significativas anexadas.

sentences.en: Although he is wealthy, he leads a remarkably modest life.
sentences.pt: Embora ele seja rico, leva uma vida notavelmente modesta.

sentences.en: She arrived on time, although the traffic was horrific.
sentences.pt: Ela chegou na hora, embora o trânsito estivesse horrível.

sentences.en: Although the food was delicious, the service was lackluster.
sentences.pt: Embora a comida estivesse deliciosa, o serviço deixou a desejar.

sentences.en: He refused the offer, although it would have doubled his salary.
sentences.pt: Ele recusou a oferta, embora isso tivesse dobrado seu salário.

sentences.en: Although inexperienced, the new recruit shows great potential.
sentences.pt: Embora inexperiente, o novo recruta mostra grande potencial.

sentences.en: The theory is widely accepted, although some skeptics remain.
sentences.pt: A teoria é amplamente aceita, embora permaneçam alguns céticos.

sentences.en: Although the path was steep, the hikers continued their ascent.
sentences.pt: Embora o caminho fosse íngreme, os caminhantes continuaram sua subida.

sentences.en: She forgave him, although she could never forget the betrayal.
sentences.pt: Ela o perdoou, embora nunca pudesse esquecer a traição.

sentences.en: Although usually punctual, he was late for the meeting today.
sentences.pt: Embora geralmente pontual, ele se atrasou para a reunião hoje.

sentences.en: The car runs well, although it is twenty years old.
sentences.pt: O carro funciona bem, embora tenha vinte anos.

sentences.en: Although I prefer tea, I will drink coffee this morning.
sentences.pt: Embora eu prefira chá, tomarei café esta manhã.

sentences.en: The negotiations continued, although progress was painfully slow.
sentences.pt: As negociações continuaram, embora o progresso fosse dolorosamente lento.

sentences.en: Although she tried her best, the results were disappointing.
sentences.pt: Embora ela tenha se esforçado ao máximo, os resultados foram decepcionantes.

sentences.en: He is a strict teacher, although very fair with grading.
sentences.pt: Ele é um professor rigoroso, embora muito justo com as notas.

sentences.en: Although the storm had passed, the sea remained rough.
sentences.pt: Embora a tempestade tivesse passado, o mar permanecia agitado.

sentences.en: We bought the house, although it needs extensive renovations.
sentences.pt: Compramos a casa, embora ela precise de grandes reformas.

sentences.en: Although silenced by the regime, his ideas continued to spread.
sentences.pt: Embora silenciadas pelo regime, suas ideias continuaram a se espalhar.

sentences.en: The layout is confusing, although the design is aesthetically pleasing.
sentences.pt: O layout é confuso, embora o design seja esteticamente agradável.

sentences.en: Although invited, she declined to attend the ceremony.
sentences.pt: Embora convidada, ela recusou comparecer à cerimônia.

sentences.en: He denied the allegations, although the evidence was damning.
sentences.pt: Ele negou as acusações, embora as evidências fossem condenatórias.

sentences.en: Although small, the apartment is perfectly located downtown.
sentences.pt: Embora pequeno, o apartamento é perfeitamente localizado no centro.

sentences.en: The medicine is effective, although it has unpleasant side effects.
sentences.pt: O remédio é eficaz, embora tenha efeitos colaterais desagradáveis.

sentences.en: Although tempted to quit, he persevered until the end.
sentences.pt: Embora tentado a desistir, ele perseverou até o fim.

sentences.en: The argument is valid, although it ignores several key factors.
sentences.pt: O argumento é válido, embora ignore vários fatores fundamentais.

sentences.en: Although tired of the noise, she stayed at the party.
sentences.pt: Embora cansada do barulho, ela ficou na festa.

sentences.en: He remained optimistic, although the situation appeared dire.
sentences.pt: Ele permaneceu otimista, embora a situação parecesse terrível.

sentences.en: Although flawed, the plan is the best option we have.
sentences.pt: Embora falho, o plano é a melhor opção que temos.

sentences.en: She is very private, although she is a public figure.
sentences.pt: Ela é muito reservada, embora seja uma figura pública.
